That's a great idea! Using the Fitbit app to track your progress is a convenient and efficient way to monitor your daily activity, sleep, and other health metrics. And setting a reminder on your calendar to stretch every morning at the same time is an excellent way to create a consistent habit.

Here are a few more tips to help you make the most of the Fitbit app and your morning stretching routine:

1. **Set a specific goal**: In the Fitbit app, set a specific goal for your morning stretching routine, such as "Stretch for 15 minutes, 7 days a week." This will help you stay motivated and focused on your goal.
2. **Log your stretches**: Use the Fitbit app to log your stretching exercises, including the type of stretch, duration, and intensity. This will help you track your progress and identify areas for improvement.
3. **Track your progress over time**: Use the Fitbit app to view your progress over time, including your daily activity, sleep, and other health metrics. This will help you see how your morning stretching routine is impacting your overall health and fitness.
4. **Customize your reminders**: In the Fitbit app, you can customize your reminders to fit your needs. For example, you can set reminders to stretch at the same time every morning, or to move throughout the day.
5. **Make it a habit**: Consistency is key when it comes to developing a new habit. Try to perform your morning stretching routine at the same time every day, even on weekends or days off.
6. **Mix it up**: To avoid boredom and prevent plateaus, mix up your stretching routine every few weeks. Try new exercises, incorporate props like resistance bands or foam rollers, or focus on different muscle groups.
7. **Celebrate milestones**: Celebrate your progress along the way, no matter how small it may seem. This will help you stay motivated and encouraged to continue working towards your goals.

By following these tips, you'll be well on your way to developing a consistent morning stretching routine that will help you achieve your fitness goals. Good luck!
